name: Leave request sent
subject: Leave request of ($LeaveRequest.user.name$)
content:
Hello $LeaveRequest.user.employee.managerUser.name$,


$LeaveRequest.user.name$ informs you of a leave request from $LeaveRequest.fromDateT; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ to $LeaveRequest.toDateT; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ on $LeaveRequest.leaveLine.leaveReason.name$ ($LeaveRequest.duration$ $LeaveRequest.leaveLine.leaveReason.unitSelect$).

Please log in to consult it.

You may reject or validate it.


Best regards
metaModel.name: LeaveRequest

name: Leave request refused
subject: Leave request rejection
content:
Hello $LeaveRequest.user.name$,


unfortunately, Your leave request for the period from $LeaveRequest.fromDateT; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ to $LeaveRequest.toDateT; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ can not be accepted.

Please log in to consult it.

In staying at your disposal to discuss it,


Best regards


$LeaveRequest.refusedBy.name$
metaModel.name: LeaveRequest

name: Leave request validated
subject: Leave request validation
content:
Hello $LeaveRequest.user.name$,


Your leave request for the period from $LeaveRequest.fromDateT; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ to $LeaveRequest.toDateT; format="E. d MMM yyyy"$ has been validated.

Please log in to consult it.


Best regards


$LeaveRequest.validatedBy.name$
metaModel.name: LeaveRequest
